page.title: 09Communications in Four Lanes
page.content: { Roads.The major route in our area is the main road from Redruth to Helston which passes through the village virtually dividing it into two parts. The B3297,as it is known, runs right outside the school gate it is straight here and traffic is both heavy and fast. Buses. A bus service runs through the village in both directions for Redruth and Helston.This service is run by Western National and by Grenville Motors.The service is four times daily in both directions. Aerials.Being high up the area has numerous aerials,there is a television mast just on our Northern boundary which dominates the skyline for miles around.Carmenellis has Police aerials as well as British Telecom ones for the Isles of Scilly.
